title: The Capital of Crits
goal: Artie must hide in plain sight while trying to find a way to stabilize his build.
stakes_shift: The stakes move from physical survival to social navigation and avoiding the 'System Police'.

bridge.from_prev: Artie is a fugitive from Vane's ego.
bridge.to_next: Artie enters the Grand Arena for a 'Low-Stakes' tournament.

sections.title: The City of Gold and Glitches
sections.intent: Explore the religious reverence for RNG in the capital and the illegality of stat-wiping.

scenes.summary: Artie enters the capital and witnesses the 'Temple of the D20,' where priests pray for high rolls.
scenes.outcome: Artie realizes he is basically a walking god in this religion.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.

scenes.summary: Artie tries to find a 'Stat-Wiper' to fix his 1 HP, but finds out it's a crime punishable by 'Deletion'.
scenes.outcome: Artie accepts that he is stuck with his 1 HP glass cannon build forever.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.
scenes.end_condition_echo: Artie accepts that he is stuck with his 1 HP glass cannon build forever.

sections.title: The Underground Market
sections.intent: Introduce the 'Dev-Haters' faction and provide Artie with illegal survival tools.

scenes.summary: Fizz leads Artie to a black market run by 'Dev-Haters' who sell items that bypass System rules, including a 'Lag-Switch' potion.
scenes.outcome: Artie gains access to a 'Lag-Switch' potion.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.

scenes.summary: Artie meets Silas again, acting as an informant who reveals that Vane is the son of the High Priest of RNG.
scenes.outcome: The rivalry with Vane just became a religious war.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.

scenes.summary: The market is raided by 'System Sentinels,' and Artie uses his Lag-Switch to escape, though it leaves him speaking in binary.
scenes.outcome: Artie escapes a sentinel raid but is left speaking in binary for an hour.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.
scenes.end_condition_echo: Artie escapes a sentinel raid but is left speaking in binary for an hour.

sections.title: The Arena Invitation
sections.intent: Force Artie into the public spotlight through financial desperation and a high-stakes tournament.

scenes.summary: Artie sees a flyer for the 'Grand Crit-Off,' where the prize is a 'Shield of Infinite Health'.
scenes.outcome: Artie decides to enter, despite the risk of exposure.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.

scenes.summary: Artie registers under the name 'Crit-iculous' and accidentally sets his entry fee to his entire gold reserve.
scenes.outcome: Artie is now broke and must win the tournament to survive.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.

scenes.summary: Vane sees Artie's name on the tournament roster and prepares to 'delete' him in front of the public.
scenes.outcome: Vane sees Artie's name on the tournament roster, setting the stage for the final duel.
scenes.end_condition_echo: Vane sees Artie's name on the tournament roster, setting the stage for the final duel.
